A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not a bad film\, but a very bad Star Wars plotwise: it completely disregards Episode VII's promising teased elements and manages to damage Original Trilogy characters in both active and passive actions. Enjoyable by those who do not care about the existing Star Wars universe and characters; very disappointing otherwise. Good acting performances; bad comic reliefs. As visually and musically great as a Star Wars film should be.
